rooms.description: Open living and dining area with floor-to-ceiling windows offering panoramic views; designed with luxury finishes and Vastu compliant layout.
Modern, open-concept kitchen adjoining the lounge area, featuring high-end appliances and ample workspace for family interactions.
Spacious dining room with elegant lighting and a view to the exterior, positioned according to Vastu principles for social interaction.
Luxury master bedroom with private en-suite bathroom, incorporating Vastu guidelines to ensure restful energy; includes large windows for natural light.
Cozy secondary bedroom designed to accommodate the family's needs while maintaining privacy and comfort, aligned with local cultural aesthetics.
Dedicated home theater room equipped with state-of-the-art audiovisual systems; designed with soundproofing measures and ambient lighting for an immersive experience.
A dedicated, well-lit home office space designed to foster productivity while maintaining a luxurious design aesthetic in line with family requirements.

openings.description: Large, accessible entry door that is inviting and adheres to both modern architectural norms and Vastu principles by orienting correctly relative to the plot's irregular shape.
Balconies adjoining living areas with floor-to-ceiling windows to enhance natural lighting and ventilation, designed for luxury and comfort.
